words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H6258 adv. ʿattah 'now'; KJV 'now', ESV 'now', NASB 'now'
H7200 Qal impf. 2ms of רָאָה 'to see'; KJV 'shalt thou see', ESV 'you shall see', NASB 'you shall see'
H834 rel. pron. ʾasher 'who, which, that'; KJV 'what', ESV 'what', NASB 'what'
H6213 Qal impf. 1cs of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'I will do', ESV 'I will do', NASB 'I will do'
H6547 prep. l- + proper name; KJV 'to Pharaoh', ESV 'to Pharaoh', NASB 'to Pharaoh'
H3588 conj. ki 'for, because, that'; KJV 'for', ESV 'for', NASB 'for'
H3027 prep. b- + n.fs yad 'hand'; KJV 'with a strong hand', ESV 'with a strong hand', NASB 'under compulsion'
H2389 adj.fs chazaqah 'strong, mighty'; KJV 'strong', ESV 'strong', NASB 'compulsion' (NASB interprets idiomatically)
H7971 Piel impf. 3ms + 3mp suff. of שָׁלַח 'to send'; KJV 'shall he let them go', ESV 'he shall send them out', NASB 'he will let them go'
H3027 conj. + prep. b- + n.fs yad 'hand'; KJV 'with a strong hand', ESV 'with a strong hand', NASB 'under compulsion'
H2389 adj.fs chazaqah 'strong, mighty'; same as word 12
H1644 Piel impf. 3ms + 3mp suff. of גָּרַשׁ 'to drive out, expel'; KJV 'shall he drive them out', ESV 'he shall drive them out', NASB 'he will drive them out'
H776 prep. min + n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'out of his land', ESV 'out of his land', NASB 'from his land'
